It is not very sterdy. Won't help if you are planning to use it for longer time everyday. Bears only light weight. Colour is good, exactly as shown in the picture. Length, wideness is as mentioned in the description.
Misleading images and description .  The actual table dimensions { 24×16x 11) do not match the description and images shown (27.6x18.9×11.1).

Very light weighted. Honestly the glass keeping circle in the table is not of much use. So you can choose the one without it. Best for children an well as it’s very light weighted. Good looking table. Worth buying.
As this is very lightweight, it cannot balance itself well.  The design also doesn't help as the table is shaky and its a risk to put the laptop on it unattended.
Nice procduct  and of good quality

The table is really good. Only if the cup holder and the phone holder did not come off. These are not stuck to the table and come off every time you carry it. Otherwise very satisfied with the product.
Looks really good in the picture. In reality it looks like cheap MDF stuff. Quality is strictly ok. Over priced.

Received the product just today. Overall the product looks good and matches my expectations. But unfortunately I received damaged product. There are multiple damages and I've added pics. I would need a replacement. Thans
The built is highly satisfying and a standard size classmate register can be kept on it to read or write while the plastic cup holder often comes out but in total the product is good.
Top surface has started coming off within a week. Not sure how long it will last.
Its good ... but
Cup holder gets in way for mouse

Decent product at this price, build quality is good and light in weight,  since a bit light this can wobble a bit on bed, but this is fine

Broken table came. Quality is ok.ok..not tht great.
Useful
product and worth the price

The product is very light weight so I doubt its durability and sturdiness. The legs are made of steel but the attachment that hold it with the table is made up of plastic. They should have added adhesive to its cup and tab holder, they come out very easily, it was unexpected. The ply board is half a inch thick. Overall it has a premium outlook. caution: it is not for kids.

At first i am hesitate to buy it because there was no ratings and review for this. I thought to place order for this because this got the least price when compared to other tables with cup holder that is 699rs, after receiving the order everything is okay,build quality is good and cup holder is on the right hand side. Blindly Go for it if it is available for less than 700rs
It is perfect.. good quality,nice design
I can keep my phone and iPad together in that provided space but the only thing I wanted is that the height should have been 1-2 inch higher than it is now...

Although I'm not returning it because I need a study table urgently, still would like to highlight the issues in the product. The product is low quality partical board material. The legs are low quality tubes which came with dents and a bent on the legs. Overall finishing is also not good.
Due to this lockdown scenario, I'm not venturing out of home but I'm sure at much lower price u can find a better product in your local furniture shop. My suggestion. Don't buy.

The product just arrived today and after the initial usage I found that the dimensions mentioned in the website are different from the dimensions of the product arrived. In the website it's 27.6 x 18.9 x 11.1 And actual is 23.5 x 15.5 x 9. Either correct the dimensions on the website or deliver the same product as mentioned. A little disappointed.

I bought this product couple of weeks back from Amazon. The delivery was on time considering the lockdown period however the product is not worth its price. The table legs are very shaky and with a little movement it easily falls off. I was looking for better sturdiness at the price. Only good feature about this one is its mobile/tablet holder.
High risk to laptop /tablet/ phone due to its sturdiness.

Good laptop bed-table for the price. I bought two of these but from different sellers. This one was 50/- cheaper and the plastic inserts are of same colour. These tables are never absolutely stable by design (I would have given 5 stars otherwise). So nothing wrong in that. Good quality. Packaging was done very well. I already have a good quality wooden table for which I paid double. But I like this one as this one is bit taller and I can stretch my legs below the table more comfortably. Well it's for my daughter, so pink is what she chose! The grip works better than the wooden one. Width of this one is more. It's lighter in weight to carry more comfortably. Feels sturdy enough. Go for it!
Team Amazon,

Very disappointed with this purchase! It's not even been a month and as you can see from the picture I have attached, the leg of the table has broken. Also the tab holder and cup holder have also become loose and come out. This is a serious concern on quality of the products that you are selling. I have crossed my exchange window but it would be great if you can still provide me a replacement for this product at the earliest.
You can call me for any further details.
Its a useful product for those who don't have a working table and are working on couch /bed. The table itself is lightweight making it easy to move around the legs and hinge seem durable.
I loved the table. Much helpful.
Just one minus point it is not stable even on the plain surface! It shakes even with just simple movement
Other than this anyone can buy it without any doubt.
Its really nice and lightweight. Portable . Use it daily for online classes . Also the tab holder is amazing and very useful
In the price i think its a decent buy. Could have been more sturdy but i think then it would have been heavier. Just started using this so lets see how durable this thing is.
Product is good worth every penny.. you can use it comfortably in bed and on floor.
The upper wood part is very perfect but the stand is not good. not good for heavy item.
Not at all easy to fold.. the legs started cracking just after 1 day of use. Bad product assembly
Very  bad....not stable also
Don't buy!! Waste of money. Stand is loose after 3days use. The top part starts removing.
Quality is not good... fittings are loose
The measurements are completely wrong. For this price there is a better product. It is very bad on their part to mislead with wrong dimensions.

The product finish is really good. It is extremely light weight but not very sturdy. My kids found it very good for their studies. But I am not a 100% sure if I will use my laptop on it. I primarily bought it for the kids to study and it serves the purpose well.

There are 3 problems with this table.
1. The cup and phone plastic stands are loosely fitted. Comes out every now and then. It should have been fitted to the table with glue or something else.
2. The legs have rounded edges with rubber padding. So if you want to keep it on the bed, the balance is terrible.
3. The biggest problem is the side plastic protection applied to the ply top.nit came off within a few days of use. Very badly pasted. See the attached pic.
Overall durability is bad.
